EU dispute resolution

The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (ODR): https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr/.
Our e-mail address can be found above in this legal notice.

Consumer dispute resolution / universal arbitration board

We are neither willing nor obliged to participate in dispute-resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

Central contact point under the Digital Services Act (DSA – Regulation (EU) 2022/265)

Our central contact point for users and authorities pursuant to Art. 11, 12 DSA can be reached as follows:

E-mail: mail@metafeller.com
Phone: +49 2196 8836047

Languages available for contact: German, English.
